descriptionHtml:
This mod is a resource providing some replacement textures for the HDT cloaks by kryptongirlkara ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59700/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59700/[/url]).

this requires both the HDT physics extension by HydrogensaysHDT ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/url]) and the capes mod linked above.

the textures in this resource are mostly black and white for easy recoloring to suit your needs. the capes here are also very rough retextures because i am not the best texturer nor the most patient person in the world. i consider them a work in progress and will upload new ones and edit the existing ones as it interest me to do so. i will however leave old versions here for their resource value.

also included in this resource are a black, white, and grey base texture for your own custom capes. the white is a little too bright ingame though so i do not reccomend using it without adding some contrast.

the pictures i have uploaded are just a preview there are more in the archive so take a look.

7/29/15 i extracted the original redguard clothes dds from the HD texture pack from bethesda. all cloaks will now use the HD textures as a base because pixels. pixels are bad. going to start replacing the ones i already made with higher res textures. 

if anybody has any requests please feel free to post them.

Installation: Manualy replace the cape textures by renaming these and replacing the existing ones in data/Textures/hdt capes

Versions
1.0 Initial release
1.1 added some legacy of kain stuff. source is low rez sorry. I am working on recreating these at higher resolutions.
1.2 started adding various banners from the vanilla game as capes. also added some new capes: 3 Legend of Zelda, 2 DisHonored, 1 final fantasy 12, 1 World of Warcraft, 1 Warframe.
author: Dracula420
